short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly add checkboxes to your messages! Quickly delete or archive individual chats, or bulk manage them all with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Messages Experience with Ease!

Advantages:
* Multi-Language Support: Works seamlessly in all languages.
* Smooth and User-Friendly UI: Enjoy an intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface.
* Fast and Time-Saving: Efficiently manage your messages with just a few clicks.
* Free Trial: Get a taste of the full experience with a limit of 5 uses.

How It Works:
Download the Extension: Add it to your Chrome browser.
Click the Extension Icon: Access the extension features from your browser toolbar.
1. Open Messages page: Click the button labeled "Go to Messages Page" if Messages page isn't already open.
2. Add Checkboxes: Click "Add Checkboxes to Messages" to enable checkboxes next to your messages. You can remove them anytime by clicking "Remove Checkboxes."
3. Select Messages: Use "Select All Messages / Toggle All" to select all messages, or manually choose individual messages.
4. Manage Messages:
* Click "Delete Selected Messages" to remove chosen messages.
* Click "Archive Selected Messages" to move messages to your archive.



Note: This extension operates independently and is not officially authorized or endorsed by Facebook.
